title: Time of issuance
context: PART II. EXECUTION Rules of Court See HRCP rules 64, 69; DCRCP rules 64, 69. §651-31 Time of issuance. Execution and alias executions upon any judgment or decree of a court for the payment of money, may be issued at any time during the life of the judgment or decree. [CC 1859, §1031; am L 1919, c 42, §1; RL 1925, §2436; am L 1929, c 81, §1; RL 1935, §4135; RL 1945, §10162; RL 1955, §233-30; HRS §651-31; am L 1970, c 188, §39] Revision Note The words &ldquo;of record or a judge thereof, or any judgment of a district magistrate&rdquo; following &ldquo;court&rdquo; have been deleted to give effect to L 1970, c 188. Case Notes Execution on subsisting and valid foreign judgment. 128 F. Supp. 697, 706 (1955). Issuance of second writ of execution. 18 H. 307 (1907).
